issue.title: [C++] Do not build ORC adapter by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1969](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1969). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We've been quite conservative about building add-ons – for example the Plasma build is disabled by default. We should do the same for the ORC adapter
